00285 
00287 #define SPIS_ASYNC_GET_RESULT(async, context) \
00288     { (async)->forget = 0;                     \
00289       (async)->callback_context = context; }
00290 
00292 #define SPIS_ASYNC_FORGET(async) \
00293     { (async)->forget = 1; \
00294       (async)->callback_routine = NULL; }
00295 
00298 #define SPIS_ASYNC_CALLBACK(async, routine, context) \
00299     { (async)->forget = 1; \
00300       (async)->callback_routine = routine; \
00301       (async)->callback_context = context; }
